reference_a:

  title = {Investigating the association between social interactions and personality states dynamics},

features.name: extraversion
features.coding:
Average score of the items ‘extraverted, enthusiastic’ and ‘reserved, quiet’ (reversed) (Ten-Item Personality Inventory)
During the last half hour, how ... have you been? 
1 = Strongly disagree
7 = Strongly agree

features.name: agreeableness
features.coding:
Average score of the items ‘sympathetic, warm’ and ‘critical, quarrelsome’ (reversed) (Ten-Item Personality Inventory)
During the last half hour, how ... have you been? 
1 = Strongly disagree
7 = Strongly agree

features.name: conscientiousness
features.coding:
Average score of the items ‘dependable, self-disciplined’ and ‘disorganized, careless’ (reversed) (Ten-Item Personality Inventory)
During the last half hour, how ... have you been? 
1 = Strongly disagree
7 = Strongly agree

features.name: emotional_stability
features.coding:
Average score of the items ‘calm, emotionally stable’ and ‘anxious, easily upset’ (reversed) (Ten-Item Personality Inventory)
During the last half hour, how ... have you been? 
1 = Strongly disagree
7 = Strongly agree

features.name: openness
features.coding:
Average score of the items ‘open to new experiences, complex’ and ‘conventional, uncreative’ (reversed) (Ten-Item Personality Inventory)
During the last half hour, how ... have you been? 
1 = Strongly disagree
7 = Strongly agree
